name: Kim Deal
text: Neat, clean, very friendly and helpful.

name: Cornellious Sanford
text: Fast and on time when needed

name: Amanda Pruett
text: Online listed that the tool we needed was available for rent and went in and they didn’t have it. Lady that helped us was rude. Call before you go.

name: Rene Laizer
text: Nice people. Helped me find what I was looking for even though they didn't have it...

name: Shannon Garner
text: The Dewalt Center has closed, but Tool Expo has opened in the same location and is an authorized Dewalt service center. They are authorized for Makita as well, but can service almost any brand. Friendly, professional staff and quick turn around time.

name: larry rainer
text: Great people,  really good service

name: Starla Wilson
text: Little pricey but was able to get equipment needed with very little problem

name: Rod Drummond
text: Good value you a lot of tools.

name: David Cagle
text: Had what I needed and charged a little much but at least they took care of my need.

name: Denise Hicks Young
text: Friendly employees.

name: Patrick Wilder
text: Went to rent a stump grinder and without seeing the stump was told it wouldn't work. You be the judge of that...

name: John Haggard
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly.  The process was super easy. I needed a hammer drill for a single hole in my bric, so Home Depot tool rental saved me some money versus buying a drill and masonry bit.

name: Inspiring Others to Change
text: Absolutely rude customer service. Extremely elitist attitude by the customer service representatives, almost as if we are bothering them to rent equipment. I would not recommend going here unless it’s your last resort.

name: Motaz Hanson
text: Why on Earth does that place have a one star?! The friendliest employees in a home Depot ever! Jim at the tool rental was excellent. He was very patient with my questions and got me out quickly. I highly recommend this professional and friendly home Depot.

name: Phillip Arnold
text: Whatever you do dont rent from here they keep sending out broken equipment. Happened to me 2 times so far. But this second time the lady i delt with when i brought it back the next day like i was doing something wrong and was being very confrontational and argumentative. Was planning on exchanging for something else, but after how she acted i wasnt gonna rent anything else. She also didnt want to refund me but she knew i wasn't bavking dowm on the situation.

name: Jonathon hardin
text: I tried to rent a piece of equipment from here and the woman at the tool rental desk was very rude and acted like I was bothering her. I left there and went to sunbelt rentals and rented a larger piece of equipment for nearly the same cost as the very small piece Home Depot had to offer.

name: pako Silva
text: Is ok  but you can find better prices at robin rents !

name: Scott Perry
text: I rented a towable hydraulic auger to dig holes for my pole barn and a pin sheered with 3 hours left on my 24 hour rental. I still had three 18" holes to dig. They told me to bring it in and swap it, and I would get a new 24 hour rental at no extra charge. I am very satisfied with the Tool Rental Center at Home Depot at Lawson's Ridge in Madison. I will use them again and fully recommend their services.

name: Eric Ibarra
text: Convenient place to rent tools!

name: Simeon
text: Had to rent some tools, the staff was very helpful.

name: Renata K. Libhart
text: We've rented several tools here & have never encountered any problems. Will do business with again.
